text: Bolesław II the Generous, also known as the Bold and the Cruel ( ; Śmiały; Okrutny; c. 1042 – 2 or 3 April 1081 or 1082), was Duke of Poland from 1058 to 1076. He was third King of Poland from 1076 to 1079. == References == Category:1040s births Category:1080s deaths Category:Polish dukes Category:Kings of Poland
title: Bolesław II the Generous
